bibl.title: The Chester Beatty Biblical Papyri. Descriptions and Texts of Twelve Manuscripts on Papyrus of the Greek Bible. Fasciculus VIII. Enoch and Melito. [Part 2.] Plates.
bibl.note: P. Chester Beatty XII + P. Mich. Inv. 5552-5553 (= van Haelst 578; 579; 677). - [Part 1. Text] = Campbell Bonner, The Homily on the Passion by Melito Bishop of Sardis and Some Fragments of the Apocryphal Ezechiel = Studies and Documents. XII (London, 1940); - Campbell Bonner, with the collaboration of Herbert C. Youtie, The Last Chapters of Enoch in Greek = Studies and Documents. VIII (London, 1937).
Kenyon Frederic G., The Chester Beatty Biblical Papyri. Descriptions and Texts of Twelve Manuscripts on Papyrus of the Greek Bible. Fasciculus VIII. Enoch and Melito. [Part 2.] Plates.
London, E. Walker, 1941, 4Â°, 12 pp. et 28 pll.
141.4 P. Chester Beatty XII + P. Mich. Inv. 5552-5553
